article_title: Many students in Michiana represented in list of National Merit Scholarship semifinalists
article_text: The National Merit Scholarship Corporation has announced the 16,000 semifinalists among this year's high school seniors. Finalists will be announced about February, and winners will be announced in the spring and/or summer. The following semifinalists attend school in The Tribune's circulation area.
